channel.title: Rollbacks
channel.description: Why wasnt nifel or "piggle" rolled back when they were banned, its not like he didnt grief a mega ton of our torches and pistons... as well as a bunch of magma's rails

item.title: Rollbacks
item.dc:creator: @Spankr_Poodle Spankr Poodle
item.description:
@Spankr_Poodle wrote:

Try Skinz too. That name appeard multiple times when I was using hawk tool:
http://dl.dropbox.com/u/20407697/2011-09-09_13.01.23.png
http://dl.dropbox.com/u/20407697/2011-09-09_13.10.52.png

Also, when I was using hawk tool on the other part of my farm, it said that the last person who edited it was me, which was on the 28 of August. Even though there are blocks missing, it doesn’t say someone broke them.

Read full topic

item.title: Rollbacks
item.dc:creator: @hat_trix hat trix
item.description:
@hat_trix wrote:

if u read the topic i posted in the report, at the very top it names most of the accounts he used at the time.

Nifel
notNifel
Deniz
piggle

i know there were a couple more, i just cant remember them atm

Read full topic

item.title: Rollbacks
item.dc:creator: @Spankr_Poodle Spankr Poodle
item.description:
@Spankr_Poodle wrote:

I guess that he used multiple accounts to grief us. The tourches are still missing, and one of my farms didn’t get rolled back. The stuff he shows on the video are rolled back though.

I can’t check with hawk tool because it isn’t working right now, and I need to leave for work, so I will check when I get home from work.

Read full topic

item.title: Rollbacks
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

LilXCj:

Are you kidding me, I rolled them back.

nothing has been rolled back, my tracks are still missing pieces, pistons gone, redstone and regular torches are all gone (he griefed a colossal amount of torches)

Read full topic

item.title: Rollbacks
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

reyx7:

World 2 will make all of this better. Just be patient…

that doesnt take away from the fact that there are issues flying around and nobody is here to properly deal with them, regardless if there is a new world on the horizon or not

people like telenim are always going to be causing trouble and there always needs to be moderation at the ready, in the time it took to deal with him this last time he had already festered and done a great deal of damage and he wasnt even rolled back

Read full topic

item.title: Rollbacks
item.dc:creator: @hat_trix hat trix
item.description:
@hat_trix wrote:

i understand the point, i was just making a remark to what agl said. im sure the mod will see the topic, if nothing is done point it out to him. then if nothing is done, obv the mod isnt doing their job.

was it logged?

Read full topic

item.title: Rollbacks
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

[quote=“hat trix, post:5, topic:413992”][quote author=noobs are ftw link=topic=515956.msg3743137#msg3743137 date=1315531419]

server is going to shit and no1 seems to care thats y

mitb needs to get some more mods because the ones now are so inactive and dont care just like you said

ive been asking for new mods the whole summer mitb doesnt seem to care hes never on it anyway so either hes ignoring me and doesnt care or he doesnt believe everyone who says we need more staff
[/quote]

or he is hosting this because the people should be able to take care of it without him being there on everyone request. I do agree that we need a new roll back tool, but as long as this one works slightly, it will do. he has also said, if you happen to come across something better, he might use it.

its not his fault the immature fucks of mopar cant handle a minecraft server(that goes to the griefers n rule breakers, not u :P).[/quote]

… the point is nothing got rolled back because nobody cared to all ituharu did was ban them without rolling back -.-

Read full topic

item.title: Rollbacks
item.dc:creator: @hat_trix hat trix
item.description:
@hat_trix wrote:

[quote=“noobs are ftw, post:4, topic:413992”][quote author=badger41 link=topic=515956.msg3743134#msg3743134 date=1315531295]

server is going to shit and no1 seems to care thats y

mitb needs to get some more mods because the ones now are so inactive and dont care just like you said
[/quote]

ive been asking for new mods the whole summer mitb doesnt seem to care hes never on it anyway so either hes ignoring me and doesnt care or he doesnt believe everyone who says we need more staff[/quote]

or he is hosting this because the people should be able to take care of it without him being there on everyone request. I do agree that we need a new roll back tool, but as long as this one works slightly, it will do. he has also said, if you happen to come across something better, he might use it.

its not his fault the immature fucks of mopar cant handle a minecraft server(that goes to the griefers n rule breakers, not u :P).

Read full topic
